metadata.title: CVE-2021-47057 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:sun8i-ss - Fix memory leak of object d when dma_iv fails to map In the casewhere the dma_iv mapping fails, the return error path leaks the memoryallocated to object d. Fix this by adding a new error return label andjumping to this to ensure d is free'd before the return.Addresses-Coverity: ("Resource leak")

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
